findings.title: Possible functions out-of-order because of using cycles over the stakeholders array
findings.description: The contract uses cycles over the stakeholders array which may cause possible functions to dysfunction, leading to issues such as high gas fees and unavailability of getTotalRewards.

findings.title: Using SafeMath for Solidity >= 0.8.0
findings.description: Starting from solc version 0.8.0, solidity has built-in math over and underflow validation, making additional validation with SafeMath unnecessary and gas-inefficient.

findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.
